presentation.title: Welcome to my portfolio
presentation.subtitle: I am Marion Robert and I am a Full-stack Web Developer.

paragraphs.1: With a background in law, I spent three rewarding years supporting asylum seekers in the community sector. Driven by a desire for new things and daily challenges, I retrained in IT.
paragraphs.2: I discovered programming by learning the Python language, then I followed two training courses in web development with Le Wagon and the 3w Academy.
paragraphs.3: Over the last two years, my various apprenticeships, projects and experiences have allowed me to put my knowledge into practice and strengthen my interest in IT.

harmony.title: Harmony
harmony.description: Harmony helps beneficiaries of international protection integrate by promoting interactions between neighbors. The application allows you to propose or book activities to exchange services, and each help provided allows you to accumulate points to receive help in return.
harmony.features: User session management;Activity filtering; Points management; Content moderation by an administrator;User notification via emails

verdure.title: Verdure
verdure.description: Verdure is a web application for selling indoor plants.
verdure.features: User session management;Cart management;Payment management with Stripe;Administrator and user dashboard;Tracking and updating order status

synopsix.title: Synopsix
synopsix.description: Synopsix is a game where the goal is to guess the title of a movie based on its synopsis.
synopsix.features: Display of guessed words based on their proximity score;Visualization of clues;Ranking of top players;Choice of game mode and movie category

guitarpick.title: GuitarPick
guitarpick.description: GuitarPick is a guitar rental site developed on the Airbnb model.
guitarpick.features: User session management;Geolocation;Search for products by keywords;User dashboard;Image hosting in the cloud

waw.title: Wall Art Works
waw.description: Wall Art Works is an e-commerce site specializing in selling AI-generated paintings.
waw.features: Authentication via OmniAuth Google Facebook;Search for products by keywords;Administrator dashboard;Virtual environment preview;Cart management, payment via Stripe
